events.description: Google and Mark Zuckerberg's Meta have been accused of deliberately making platforms addictive to children and harming their mental health.

events.title: A historic downfall for the UK's former prince Andrew
events.description: Former prince Andrew's inexorable fall from grace reached an extraordinary new low as he became the first member of the UK royal family to be arrested in the modern era. Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, as he is now known, was arrested Thursday on suspicion of misconduct in public office.

events.title: South Korean court hands life in prison to exâ€‘President Yoon for insurrection
events.description: A South Korean court sentenced former President Yoon Suk Yeol to life in prison on Thursday, after finding him guilty of masterminding an insurrection linked to his December 2024 attempt to impose martial law.

events.title: Meta's Zuckerberg grilled over underage users at social media trial
events.description: CEO Mark Zuckerberg said Wednesday he regretted Meta's slow progress in identifying underage users on Instagram, as he faced stinging criticism at a landmark social media trial over accusations that his company deliberately hooked children.
